item.title: Veeam's Major H2 2023 Product Line Update
item.author: Coku2015@gmail.com (Lei Wei)
item.description: Just yesterday, Veeam officially GA’d the important updates for their entire data protection platform product line in the second half of this year. Almost every product has been updated with a new version. If you’re a Veeam power user, when you visit your Veeam homepage at https://my.veeam.com, you’ll see a full screen where all products show “New” status - these are all newly available versions released this week for download.
